PERSONA:
meet robert, a 68-year-old married man from a metropolitan area in the midwest region of the united states. he is a high school graduate and identifies as a white non-hispanic. born and raised in the u.s., robert is a devout protestant and born-again christian, attending religious services more than once a week.

politically, robert aligns himself with the republican party and holds conservative views. he is a registered voter and takes his civic duty seriously. with an annual family income exceeding $100,000, robert falls into the upper-income tier.

despite his age, robert is tech-savvy and uses the internet several times a day. he is an active member of his community, engaging in volunteer work regularly. in his free time, robert enjoys spending time with his wife and staying involved in his local church activities.

overall, robert is a dedicated family man, deeply religious, and politically engaged. he values his conservative beliefs, financial stability, and community involvement.
